017package org.microbean.constant;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.Constable;
021import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
024import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
025import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
026
027import java.util.Arrays;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.Comparator;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.Map.Entry;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.Set;
035import java.util.SortedMap;
036import java.util.SortedSet;
037
038import java.util.function.Function;
039
040import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
041import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
042import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_List;
043import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
044import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
045import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Set;
046import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
047
048import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collections;
049import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Comparator;
050import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Entry;
051import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_SortedMap;
052import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_SortedSet;
053import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_TreeMap;
054import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_TreeSet;
055
056import static org.microbean.invoke.ConstantDescs.CD_BootstrapMethods;
057
058/**
059 * A utility class containing {@code static} methods that can describe
060 * various things in {@link Constable} ways.
061 *
062 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
063 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
064 *
065 * @see #describeConstable(Collection)
066 *
067 * @see #describeConstable(Map)
068 *
069 * @see #describeConstable(Entry)
070 *
071 * @see Constable
072 */
073public final class Constables {
074
075
076  /*
077   * Constructors.
078   */
079
080
081  private Constables() {
082    super();
083  }
084
085
086  /*
087   * Static methods.
088   */
089
090
091  public static final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final ConstantDesc cd) {
092    if (cd == null) {
093      return Optional.of(NULL);
094    } else if (cd instanceof Constable c) {
095      return c.describeConstable();
096    } else {
097      return Optional.of(cd);
098    }
099  }
100
101  public static final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Constable c) {
102    return c == null ? Optional.of(NULL) : c.describeConstable();
103  }
104
105  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements) {
106    return describeConstable(elements, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
107  }
108
109  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements,
110                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
111    return describeConstable(elements, Constables::empty, f);
112  }
113
114  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements,
115                                                                             final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
116                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
117    if (elements == null) {
118      return Optional.of(NULL);
119    } else if (elements instanceof List<? extends E> l) {
120      return describeConstable(l, CD_List, cf, f);
121    } else if (elements instanceof Set<? extends E> s) {
122      return describeConstable(s, CD_Set, cf, f);
123    } else {
124      return Optional.empty();
125    }
126  }
127
128  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final List<? extends E> elements) {
129    return describeConstable(elements, CD_List, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
130  }
131
132  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final List<? extends E> elements,
133                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
134    return describeConstable(elements, CD_List, Constables::empty, f);
135  }
136
137  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Set<? extends E> elements) {
138    return describeConstable(elements, CD_Set, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
139  }
140
141  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Set<? extends E> elements,
142                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
143    return describeConstable(elements, CD_Set, Constables::empty, f);
144  }
145
146  public static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Set<? extends E> elements,
147                                                                             final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
148                                                                             final Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
149    return describeConstable(elements, CD_Set, cf, f);
150  }
151
152  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map) {
153    return describeConstable(map, Constables::empty, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
154  }
155
156  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map,
157                                                                                final Function<? super K, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> kf,
158                                                                                final Function<? super V, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> vf) {
159    return describeConstable(map, Constables::empty, kf, vf);
160  }
161
162  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map,
163                                                                                final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
164                                                                                final Function<? super K, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> kf,
165                                                                                final Function<? super V, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> vf) {
166    if (map == null) {
167      return Optional.of(NULL);
168    } else if (map instanceof Constable c) {
169      return c.describeConstable();
170    } else if (map.isEmpty()) {
171      if (map instanceof SortedMap<? extends K, ? extends V> sm) {
172        final Comparator<?> comparator = sm.comparator();
173        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
174          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
175            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
176          if (comparatorDesc != null && comparatorDesc.isPresent()) {
177            return
178              Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
179                                     "immutableSortedMapOf",
180                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap, CD_Map, CD_Comparator),
181                                     callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map, "of", CD_Map),
182                                     comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
183          }
184        }
185        return Optional.of(callStatic(CD_Collections, "emptySortedMap", MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap)));
186      }
187      return Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map, "of", CD_Map));
188    } else {
189      final ConstantDesc[] args = new ConstantDesc[map.size()];
190      int i = 0;
191      for (final Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> entry : map.entrySet()) {
192        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> e = describeConstable(entry, kf, vf);
193        if (e.isEmpty()) {
194          return Optional.empty();
195        }
196        args[i++] = e.orElseThrow();
197      }
198      final ConstantDesc unsortedMap =
199        callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map,
200                            "ofEntries",
201                            MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Map, CD_Entry.arrayType()),
202                            args);
203      if (map instanceof SortedMap<? extends K, ? extends V> sm) {
204        final Comparator<?> comparator = sm.comparator();
205        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
206          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
207            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
208          if (comparatorDesc != null && comparatorDesc.isPresent()) {
209            return
210              Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
211                                     "immutableSortedMapOf",
212                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap, CD_Map, CD_Comparator),
213                                     unsortedMap,
214                                     comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
215          }
216        }
217        return
218          Optional.of(callStatic(CD_Collections,
219                                 "unmodifiableSortedMap",
220                                 MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedMap, CD_SortedMap),
221                                 construct(CD_TreeMap,
222                                           new ClassDesc[] { CD_Map },
223                                           unsortedMap)));
224      }
225      return Optional.of(unsortedMap);
226    }
227  }
228
229  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> entry) {
230    return describeConstable(entry, Constables::empty, Constables::empty);
231  }
232
233  public static final <K, V> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> entry,
234                                                                                final Function<? super K, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> kf,
235                                                                                final Function<? super V, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> vf) {
236    if (entry == null) {
237      return Optional.of(NULL);
238    } else if (entry instanceof Constable c) {
239      return c.describeConstable();
240    } else {
241      final K k = entry.getKey();
242      final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> key;
243      if (k instanceof Constable c) {
244        key = c.describeConstable();
245      } else if (kf == null) {
246        key = Optional.empty();
247      } else {
248        key = kf.apply(k);
249      }
250      if (key.isPresent()) {
251        final V v = entry.getValue();
252        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> value;
253        if (v instanceof Constable c) {
254          value = c.describeConstable();
255        } else if (vf == null) {
256          value = Optional.empty();
257        } else {
258          value = vf.apply(v);
259        }
260        if (value.isPresent()) {
261          // Map#entry(K, V)
262          return
263            Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(CD_Map,
264                                            "entry",
265                                            MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Entry,
266                                                              CD_Object, // K erasure
267                                                              CD_Object), // V erasure
268                                            key.orElseThrow(),
269                                            value.orElseThrow()));
270        }
271      }
272      return Optional.empty();
273    }
274  }
275
276  private static final <E> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable(final Collection<? extends E> elements,
277                                                                              final ClassDesc listOrSetClassDesc,
278                                                                              final Function<? super Comparator<?>, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> cf,
279                                                                              Function<? super E, ? extends Optional<? extends ConstantDesc>> f) {
280    if (elements == null) {
281      return Optional.of(NULL);
282    } else if (elements instanceof Constable c) {
283      return c.describeConstable();
284    } else if (elements.isEmpty()) {
285      if (elements instanceof SortedSet<? extends E> ss) {
286        final Comparator<?> comparator = ss.comparator();
287        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
288          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
289            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
290          if (comparatorDesc != null && comparatorDesc.isPresent()) {
291            return
292              Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
293                                     "immutableSortedSetOf",
294                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedSet, CD_Collection, CD_Comparator),
295                                     callInterfaceStatic(CD_List, "of", CD_List),
296                                     comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
297          }
298        }
299        return Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(CD_Collections, "emptySortedSet", CD_SortedSet));
300      }
301      return Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc, "of", listOrSetClassDesc));
302    } else {
303      if (f == null) {
304        f = Constables::empty;
305      }
306      final int elementsSize = elements.size();
307      final ConstantDesc[] args = new ConstantDesc[elementsSize];
308      int i = 0;
309      for (final E element : elements) {
310        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> arg;
311        if (element instanceof Constable c) {
312          arg = c.describeConstable();
313        } else {
314          arg = f.apply(element);
315        }
316        if (arg == null || arg.isEmpty()) {
317          return Optional.empty();
318        }
319        args[i++] = arg.orElseThrow();
320      }
321      final MethodTypeDesc ofMethodTypeDesc;
322      if (elementsSize <= 10) {
323        // List.of() and Set.of() have explicit polymorphic overrides
324        // for parameter counts of up to 10.
325        final ClassDesc[] parameterArray = new ClassDesc[elementsSize];
326        Arrays.fill(parameterArray, CD_Object); // Object is the erasure of E
327        ofMethodTypeDesc = MethodTypeDesc.of(listOrSetClassDesc, parameterArray);
328      } else {
329        // After 10 parameters, List.of() and Set.of() fall back on
330        // varargs.
331        ofMethodTypeDesc = MethodTypeDesc.of(listOrSetClassDesc, CD_Object.arrayType());
332      }
333      if (elements instanceof SortedSet<? extends E> ss) {
334        final Comparator<?> comparator = ss.comparator();
335        if (comparator != null && cf != null) {
336          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> comparatorDesc =
337            comparator instanceof Constable c ? c.describeConstable() : cf.apply(comparator);
338          return
339            Optional.of(callStatic(CD_BootstrapMethods,
340                                   "immutableSortedSetOf",
341                                   MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedSet, CD_Collection, CD_Comparator),
342                                   callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc,
343                                                       "of",
344                                                       ofMethodTypeDesc,
345                                                       args),
346                                   comparatorDesc.orElseThrow()));
347        }
348        return
349          Optional.of(callStatic(CD_Collections,
350                                 "unmodifiableSortedSet",
351                                 MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_SortedSet, CD_SortedSet),
352                                 construct(CD_TreeSet,
353                                           new ClassDesc[] { CD_Collection },
354                                           callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc,
355                                                               "of",
356                                                               ofMethodTypeDesc,
357                                                               args))));
358      }
359      return
360        Optional.of(callInterfaceStatic(listOrSetClassDesc,
361                                        "of",
362                                        ofMethodTypeDesc,
363                                        args));
364    }
365  }
366
367  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> construct(final ClassDesc cd, final ClassDesc[] constructorParameterTypes, final ConstantDesc... args) {
368    final ConstantDesc[] newArgs = new ConstantDesc[args == null || args.length <= 0 ? 1 : args.length + 1];
369    newArgs[0] = MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(cd, constructorParameterTypes);
370    if (newArgs.length > 1) {
371      System.arraycopy(args, 0, newArgs, 1, args.length);
372    }
373    return DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, newArgs);
374  }
375
376  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> callInterfaceStatic(final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final ClassDesc returnType) {
377    return callInterfaceStatic(cd, name, MethodTypeDesc.of(returnType));
378  }
379
380  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> callInterfaceStatic(final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final MethodTypeDesc sig, final ConstantDesc... args) {
381    return call(DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.INTERFACE_STATIC, cd, name, sig, args);
382  }
383
384  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> callStatic(final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final MethodTypeDesc sig, final ConstantDesc... args) {
385    return call(DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC, cd, name, sig, args);
386  }
387
388  private static final DynamicConstantDesc<?> call(final DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind kind, final ClassDesc cd, final String name, final MethodTypeDesc sig, final ConstantDesc... args) {
389    final ConstantDesc[] newArgs = new ConstantDesc[args == null || args.length == 0 ? 1 : args.length + 1];
390    newArgs[0] = MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(kind, cd, name, sig);
391    if (newArgs.length > 1) {
392      System.arraycopy(args, 0, newArgs, 1, args.length);
393    }
394    return DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, newArgs);
395  }
396
397  private static final <T> Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> empty(final T ignored) {
398    return Optional.empty();
399  }
400
401}
